name: City Racing 3D: Drive Max
description:
The PURE REAL 3D racing experience proudly presented by Feamber! Bring racing game experience to a whole new level! Need an unbelievable 3D racing style? Be the king driver!

*TOP cars included! aston martin,ferrari,bmw,all the dreammachines you want!
*infinity possibility of engineering!

*Worldwide cities you can race on! Paris, Chicago, Tokyo, London and even more you can explore! All with stunning 3D graphics and real track!

*Race with all the styles you want! Classic, Elimination, 1 ON 1, or TEST Drive, just all you expected!

*Nitrogen, Drift, or you want FLY?! Race with all possibilities!
*Easy to drive! And rich to explore!
*The best racing game in slim size! Powered by Self-developed 3D Engine and Real Physics!
